translations: n.[金融]提款，[法]撤回（withdrawal 的复数形式）；退股

sentences.sentence: Computers are also being used to process withdrawals and for the payment of standing orders.
sentences.translation: 计算机也被用来处理取款和支付长期订单。

sentences.sentence: You can make withdrawals of up to $250 a day.
sentences.translation: 你一天可以从银行账户中提取最多不超过250元。
